workflow.name: Create videos with AI-generated backgrounds using Gemini and VideoBGRemover
workflow.description:
Automated workflow that generates custom AI image backgrounds from text prompts using Gemini's Nano Banana (native image generation), removes video backgrounds, and composites videos on AI-generated scenes. Create any background you can imagine without needing stock images.

## How it works

‚Ä¢ **Describe background**: Provide video URL and text prompt describing desired background scene (e.g., "modern office with city skyline at golden hour")
‚Ä¢ **AI generates image**: Gemini creates a background image from your prompt in ~10-20 seconds
‚Ä¢ **Upload to Drive**: Generated background is saved to Google Drive and made publicly accessible
‚Ä¢ **Remove & composite**: Video background is removed and composited on AI-generated scene with centered template
‚Ä¢ **Save final video**: Completed video is uploaded to Google Drive with shareable link

## Set up steps

**‚è±Ô∏è Total setup time: ~5 minutes**

‚Ä¢ **Get Gemini API Key** (~1 min): Visit https://aistudio.google.com/apikey, create new API key, add to n8n Settings ‚Üí Variables as `GEMINI_KEY`
‚Ä¢ **Get VideoBGRemover API Key** (~2 min): Visit https://videobgremover.com/n8n, sign up, add to n8n as `VIDEOBGREMOVER_KEY`
‚Ä¢ **Connect Google Drive** (~2 min): Click "Save Background Image to Drive" node, click "Connect", authorize n8n

**Use cases:**
- Marketing videos with custom branded environments tailored to your message
- Product demos with unique AI-generated backgrounds that match your product aesthetic
- Social media content with creative scenes you can't find in stock libraries
- AI avatars placed in AI-generated worlds
- Presentations with custom backgrounds generated for specific topics
- A/B testing different background variations for the same video

**Pricing:**
- Gemini: ~$0.03 per generated image
- VideoBGRemover: $0.50-$2.00 per minute of video
- Total: ~$0.53-$2.03 per video

**Triggers:** Webhook (for automation) or Manual (for testing)

**Processing time:** Typically 5-7 minutes total

**Prompt tips:** Be descriptive and specific. Instead of "office," try: "A modern minimalist office with floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking a city skyline at golden hour. Warm sunlight, polished concrete floors, sleek wooden desks, green plants."

workflow.name: AI Background Generation with Nano Banana (Gemini Image)

parameters.content:
## üé® AI Background Generation

**What it does:**
- Generates custom background image from text prompt
- Uses Gemini's Nano Banana (native image generation)
- Removes foreground video background
- Composites video on AI-generated background
- Saves final result to Google Drive

**Perfect for:**
- Creating custom scenes from imagination
- Marketing videos with branded environments
- Product demos with tailored backgrounds
- Social media content with unique visuals
- AI avatars in AI-generated worlds

**Processing time:** 2-4 minutes per video
- Image generation: ~10-20 seconds
- Background removal: ~20-60 seconds
- Composition: ~30-60 seconds

**Setup:** ~5 minutes (2 API keys)

[üìñ Full Documentation](https://docs.videobgremover.com/)

## üîë API Keys Setup (Required)

**Step 1: Gemini API Key**
- Visit: https://aistudio.google.com/apikey
- Create new API key
- Add to n8n: Settings ‚Üí Variables
  - Name: `GEMINI_KEY`
  - Value: your Gemini API key

**Step 2: VideoBGRemover API Key**
- Visit: https://videobgremover.com/api-management
- Sign up (free tier available)
- Copy your API key
- Add to n8n: Settings ‚Üí Variables
  - Name: `VIDEOBGREMOVER_KEY`
  - Value: your API key

‚úÖ This workflow uses `$vars.GEMINI_KEY` and `$vars.VIDEOBGREMOVER_KEY` (secure)

**Pricing:**
- Gemini: $0.03 per image (~1024x1024)
- VideoBGRemover: $0.50-$2.00 per min

## üì• Input Required

**video_url** (required)
- URL to your foreground video
- AI actors, product demos, talking heads
- Any resolution up to 4K
- Must be publicly accessible

**background_prompt** (required)
- Text description of desired background
- Be descriptive and specific
- Example: "A modern minimalist office with floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking a city skyline at sunset"

**aspect_ratio** (optional)
- Default: "1:1" (square)
- Landscape: "16:9", "4:3"
- Portrait: "9:16", "3:4"
- Full list: https://ai.google.dev/gemini-api/docs/image-generation#aspect_ratios

‚ö†Ô∏è Video must be **publicly accessible URL**

## üé® Nano Banana (Gemini Image)

**How it works:**
- Uses Gemini 2.5 Flash with native image generation
- Generates high-quality backgrounds from text
- Supports detailed, photorealistic prompts
- Built-in SynthID watermarking

**Prompt tips:**
- Be descriptive and specific
- Mention lighting, colors, mood
- Use photography terms for realism
- Describe the scene, not just keywords

**Examples:**
- "A cozy coffee shop interior with warm lighting and vintage decor"
- "Modern tech office with glass walls and city views"
- "Tropical beach at golden hour with palm trees"

**Output:** Base64-encoded PNG image
**Latency:** ~10-20 seconds per image

## üîÑ Processing Flow

**1. Generate Background** (~10-20s)
- Gemini creates image from prompt
- Returns base64-encoded PNG
- Supports multiple aspect ratios

**2. Background Removal** (~20-60s)
- VideoBGRemover processes video
- AI-powered segmentation
- Clean edge detection

**3. Composition** (~30-60s)
- Composite video on AI background
- Centered template (maintain aspect)
- Professional framing

**4. Upload to Drive**
- Automatic save with shareable link
- Permanent storage

‚è±Ô∏è Total: 2-4 min per video

## üíæ Google Drive Setup

**Step 1:** Connect Google Drive
- Click "Upload to Google Drive" node
- Click "Connect"
- Authorize n8n

**Step 2:** Choose folder (optional)
- Default: Root of "My Drive"
- Or select specific folder

**Output:**
- Permanent shareable link
- Direct download URL
- File metadata

‚è±Ô∏è Setup time: ~2 minutes

## üöÄ How to Use

**Manual testing:**
1. Update inputs in "Sample Inputs (manual)"
   - `video_url`: Your video URL
   - `background_prompt`: Describe background
   - `aspect_ratio`: Optional (default 1:1)
2. Click "Execute Workflow"
3. Wait 2-4 minutes for processing
4. Check Google Drive for result

**Webhook automation:**
1. Activate workflow
2. Copy webhook URL
3. POST to webhook:
```json
{
  "video_url": "https://...",
  "background_prompt": "A modern office...",
  "aspect_ratio": "16:9"
}
```

**Batch processing:** Connect to Google Sheets or Airtable for bulk automation

## üé® GEMINI AI IMAGE GENERATION SECTION
Generates custom background image from text prompt using Nano Banana ‚Üí Returns base64 PNG

## üì∏ Example: Input

![AI Actor](https://videos.videobgremover.com/public-assets/template-04-assets/01-foreground-ai-actor.jpg)

**1. Foreground Video**
*AI avatar speaking*

**Prompt:**
"Modern office with city skyline at golden hour"

**Aspect ratio:** 16:9

**Full video:**
https://videos.videobgremover.com/public-videos/assets/ai-actor.mp4

assignments.name: background_prompt
assignments.value: A modern minimalist office with floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking a vibrant city skyline at golden hour. Warm sunlight streams through the glass, casting soft shadows on a polished concrete floor. In the background, sleek wooden desks and green plants create a professional yet inviting atmosphere. The lighting is natural and diffused, creating a calm, productive mood. Photorealistic, architectural photography style.

parameters.content:
## üì∏ Example: Generated

![Generated Background](https://videos.videobgremover.com/public-assets/template-04-assets/02-generated-background-nano-banana.png)

**2. Nano Banana Output**
*AI-generated office background*

**Details:**
- Model: Gemini 2.5 Flash
- Aspect ratio: 16:9
- Resolution: ~1536x864px
- Time: ~10-15 seconds
- PNG with SynthID

**Saved to Drive & made public**

## üé¨ VIDEOBGREMOVER COMPOSITION SECTION
Removes foreground video background ‚Üí Composites on AI-generated image ‚Üí Centered template

## üíæ OUTPUT SECTION
Download final video ‚Üí Upload to Google Drive ‚Üí Return response

## üì∏ Example: Final

![Final Result](https://videos.videobgremover.com/public-assets/template-04-assets/03-final-composed-result.jpg)

**3. Composed Video**
*AI actor on AI background*

**Details:**
- Template: Centered
- Background removed
- Aspect ratio preserved
- Professional framing

**Full video:**
https://videos.videobgremover.com/public-assets/template-04-assets/final-result.mp4

**Saved to Google Drive**

assignments.name: final_result
final_result

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
